title: PVH reimagines the future of fashion with OpenAI
description: PVH Corp., parent company of Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger, is adopting ChatGPT Enterprise to bring AI into fashion design, supply chain, and consumer engagement.

title: AMA: Adaptive Memory via Multi-Agent Collaboration
description:

title: Policy of Thoughts: Scaling LLM Reasoning via Test-time Policy Evolution
description:
arXiv:2601.20379v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Large language models (LLMs) struggle with complex, long-horizon reasoning due to instability caused by their frozen policy assumption. Current test-time scaling methods treat execution feedback merely as an external signal for filtering or rewriting
